title: problemi con casella di posta hotmail.com
content:
Buongiorno, ho preoblemi con la casella di posta di hotmail.com, quando cerco di entrare esce la seguente dicitura: Uhm… non riusciamo a trovare questo sito.

Non è possibile contattare il server du127w.dub127.mail.live.com.

Se hai inserito l’indirizzo corretto, puoi: 

   Riprovare più tardi    Verificare la connessione alla rete    Controllare che Firefox abbia il permesso di accedere a Internet (la connessione potrebbe essere protetta da un firewall)

Spero possiate aiutarmi saluti

restarted my browser ..... no avail restarted my pc ... no avail

cleared cookies ... then restarted browser ... no avail


Windows 10 firefox ver: Version 143.0.1 (64-bit)

title: Bug Infection
content: I have picked up some bug(s) on my Firefox that I cannot figure out how to get rid of. With a Firefox ID I have warnings of 3 Trojan Virus detected, Virus detected, hard drive infected, secure data notice and system alert. I also got a warning that my McAfee protection had expired which is very strange. Since switching over in 2010 from Windows to Linux I have never had protection of any kind and unlike Windows have never had a single problem. In addition when I was using Windows the protection that I had was never McAfee. I suspect that these warnings are not from Firefox given the misprints, spelling errors and the poor English. It is likely phishing from some third world country. How do I get rid of this obvious garbage permanently? Many thanks! Kris

title: Smartcard congela Firefox
content:
Buenos días, Estoy teniendo un problema con Firefox 140 ESR y es que se queda congelado de manera aleatoria y no carga ninguna página. Se trata de entorno corporativo, Redhat 8.10 virtualizado por vmware, agente horizon 8.13. Este problema no muestra ningun error en pantalla visible. Hemos realizado un strace y vemos que hay repetidas llamadas al lector de PKI (ver imagen adjunta) pero desconocemos como arreglar esto. Alguien más ha tenido este problema o tratado con algo similar?

Datos adicionales: Ya hemos instalado las ultimas updates del sistema, y hemos actualizado la versión de Firefox (antes teníamos la 128 ESR) y sigue ocurriendo. Hemos probado a reinstalar el driver de PKI, utilizamos OpenSC. También hemos probado con el driver por defecto de vmware y sigue igual. En cada inicio está configurado que se borren: caché, historial, sesiones y cookies. En cada inicio el perfil que se inicia es el perfil por defecto, hay políticas de Empresa aplicadas (sin ellas aplicadas también ocurre el fallo)

Dejo a continuación un fragmento del strace:

restart_syscall(<... resuming interrupted poll ...>) = 1 read(34, "\372", 1) = 1 futex(0x7f44be20b518, FUTEX_WAKE_PRIVATE, 1) = 1 futex(0x7f44e60e8700, FUTEX_WAKE_PRIVATE, 1) = 1 write(35, "\372", 1) = 1 recvmsg(11, {msg_namelen=0}, 0) = -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable) poll([{fd=8, events=POLLIN}, {fd=11, events=POLLIN}, {fd=13, events=POLLIN}, {fd=34, events=POLLIN}], 4, 0) = 1 ([{fd=34, revents=POLLIN}]) read(34, "\372", 1) = 1 recvmsg(11, {msg_namelen=0}, 0) = -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable) poll([{fd=8, events=POLLIN}, {fd=11, events=POLLIN}, {fd=13, events=POLLIN}, {fd=34, events=POLLIN}], 4, 0) = 0 (Timeout) recvmsg(11, {msg_namelen=0}, 0) = -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable) poll([{fd=8, events=POLLIN}, {fd=11, events=POLLIN}, {fd=13, events=POLLIN}, {fd=34, events=POLLIN}], 4, 0) = 0 (Timeout) recvmsg(11, {msg_namelen=0}, 0) = -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable) poll([{fd=8, events=POLLIN}, {fd=11, events=POLLIN}, {fd=13, events=POLLIN}, {fd=34, events=POLLIN}], 4, 0) = 0 (Timeout) recvmsg(11, {msg_namelen=0}, 0) = -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable) poll([{fd=8, events=POLLIN}, {fd=11, events=POLLIN}, {fd=13, events=POLLIN}, {fd=34, events=POLLIN}], 4, -1) = 1 ([{fd=34, revents=POLLIN}]) read(34, "\372", 1) = 1 futex(0x7f44be20b518, FUTEX_WAKE_PRIVATE, 1) = 1 write(35, "\372", 1) = 1

Gracias de antemano Un saludo.
creator: Andrei

title: Firefox and Rumble Chats - FF doesnt copy name of chatter like it used to.
content:
I prefer Firefox over all other browsers I've tried

About a year ago, I think, after an update I couldnt copy a chat into LibreWriter that included the name of the chatter.

Disappointed, I found Brave browser that does copy all within the chat window.

The thing is is Brave is unreliable, and often the chat locks up after an couple hours unless it is regularly checked -I stick with Firefox for my involvement, using Brave to record only because it lags while typing, sometimes so badly a whole sentence can be typed before it appears on screen.

Can you restore the code that allowed the name of the chatter in Rumble chats to be copied like Firefox used to?

It would be much appreciated. Thank you, Biff

title: Firefox won't open PDFs, discord black screen, some web images black
content:
Hi,

I've been using Firefox for years, and suddenly I'm having these strange issues which are forcing me to use another browser while doing schoolwork. They are as follows:

- Discord. When I have Discord open, and then I click another tab, when I go back to Discord the whole screen is black. When I refresh it it's fine, but I have to do this repeatedly each time I go to another tab.

- PDFs. I use Blackboard for my college assignments, and Firefox no longer allows me to open PDFs that teachers post- I just get a blank page when I click on one.

- Black images. Most images show fine, but with some websites (for eg. home depot) the image of the product is black.

I've cleared history, cache, cookies, disabled extensions, and still no dice. Not sure what happened/how to solve this :(

Thanks for any help! zoe

title: My location according to AccuWeather says I'm in Portland Oregon, but I'm not even in the U.S.

I tried to change it according to the directions I found earlier, but the only drop-down for my city was another city in the US but none in any other countries. So now I can't change my location. How do I change my location? It wasn't like this yesterday and I have no memory as to how it became "Portland, Oregon" since last night. I don't even have a VPN so it isn't that. How do I change it back to my area without using my exact location?
